publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4472 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Civil Partnership Act 2004 (Consequential Amendments) (Scotland) Order 2006—That the Justice 1 Committee recommends that the draft Civil Partnership Act 2004 (Consequential Amendments) (Scotland) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Hugh Henry*

S2M-4472 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Civil Partnership Act 2004 (Consequential Amendments) (Scotland) Order 2006—That the Justice 1 Committee recommends that the draft Civil Partnership Act 2004 (Consequential Amendments) (Scotland) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Hugh Henry
